Player History
Released by Philadelphia on 4/1/1965...
Drafted in 6th round, 114th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 1969...
Released by Philadelphia on 7/31/1969...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 4/28/1970 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 5/28/1970 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 9/4/1976, off Bill Greif (OAK)...
Released by Cleveland on 5/26/1979...
Signed as a free agent by California on 2/2/1980 to a 2-year deal worth $515,254 per year...
Drafted in 6th round, 107th overall pick, by California in 1987...
Traded from California to New York (N) on 3/2/1989 (Going to NYM: CF A. Diaz. Going to CAL: RF L. Herndon)...
Injured on 8/15/1989 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Injured on 6/27/1997 with a Pulled Rib Cage Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
